## ReadableEthersMosaic class

Ethers-based implementation of [ReadableMosaic](./lib-base.readablemosaic.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ReadableEthersMosaic implements ReadableMosaic 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [ReadableMosaic](./lib-base.readablemosaic.md)

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `ReadableEthersMosaic` class.
